title: Run=Dim
synopsis: In the year 2050 A.D, approximately 1/10th of Japan is now under water due to the global warming effect. The city of Tokyo was no exception.
staff: [['Kuwana, Shingo', ['Producer', ' Script', ' Original Creator', ' Screenplay']], ['Satou, Yoshiteru', ['Storyboard']], ['Mizuki, Nana', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['LEGOLGEL', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Arrangement']]]
